items.title: Christian ex-Honeywell worker claims bias training violated his religious beliefs
items.description: In the lawsuit filed in a Georgia federal court, the employee alleged he was discriminated against for his refusal to retake the mandatory training.

items.title: Honeywell to Buy Sundyne to Boost Critical Equipment Portfolio
items.description: The acquisition of Sundyne is expected to bolster HON's Energy and Sustainability Solutions business.
